GSD.product_version: versions from v5.4.196 to before v5.4.198
GSD.description:
Input: stmfts - do not leave device disabled in stmfts_input_open

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.198 by commit c8735252f93fdb7a68b9cd5332dbc52ebd2fd25b, it was introduced in version v5.4.196 by commit 8c015cd524424e79b31270bd3dbdac9612c6f7db. For more details please see the references link.
